text: To te bannene dhokathi nice la'i avyo, basa! Te banne'e jyare te vrksane cakhyum, bannena guptanga ekabijani same khulla tha'i gaya ane banne potana para jannatana pandadamo jodi-jodine chupavava lagya ane te'ona palanahare temane pokarya, sum mem tamane bannene a vrksathi rokya na hata ane evum na hatum kahyum ke setana tamaro khullo satru che
